planet.name: KOI-872 b
Kepler-46 b
KIC 7109675 c
planet.description: The planetary system orbiting the star KOI-872 consists of at least 2 planets. The outer planet is not transiting itself but has been detected by transit timing variations of the inner planet. The planets are close to a 5:3 mean motion resonance.
